resources.string: This is the now playing activity. This activity opens up and starts playing that bird\'s song. You can see the picture and name of the bird. This activity will use the MediaPlayer class below to control the song

On this screen, there is a list of all the birds with a picture. You can click on these to go to the \'now playing\' screen using an explicit intent. This Activity uses a self made Class called Bird to store information about the birds. It also uses a custom ArrayListAdapter so that to get the specific format with image and birdname in the ListView. The activity will use the Digibird API (http://www.digibird.org/api/) to request birdnames, images and sounds and list the birds.
Welcome to Birdify. This is an app where you can listen to your favorite bird songs/sounds and search for new ones. On the home page it is also possible to see the most popular bird songs.

In the search menu you can be able to search for different birds you want to hear. Here can also the SearchView view be used instead. The search activity will search an external database connected to the Digibird API
